Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrd-hush] <D2D> I was thinking this about my directory

Basic listings will stay free as they are, and higher positions can only be voted by the communities, not bought.
I also don't want to add affiliates or adverts which track users with cookies.

So, In a few days I will be adding a new feature to the directory, and those who are listed can buy "power memberships". This gives them a full dedicated page, which I can totally customise with different elements, including charts, mining stats, price and logo (a bit like CMC, but richer in content)

The power members will also have a little thunder icon on the list, so they stand out a little bit amongst other listings.

And...because Hush have been the best community for voting and the most enthusiastic and supportive of the Privacy Alternatives website, even sharing it on Twitter and Reddit, I'd like to give Hush a 1 year of "power membership"  for free

Let me know what you think : )
